data: Gilderheim, Pascoe and Company | Little Hatton Garden
office of Gilderheim, Pascoe and Company | Little Hatton Garden

On the night of May 27th, 1925, the office of Gilderheim, Pascoe and Company, diamond merchants, of Little Hatton Garden, presented no unusual appearance to the patrolling constable who examined the lock and tried the door in the ordinary course of his duty.
